hero.title: Building Excellence in Syria
hero.subtitle: Specialized in aluminum, glass, and architectural solutions

glass.title: Glass Solutions
glass.description: Comprehensive glass solutions including high-performance curtain walls for modern buildings, frameless systems with spider fittings, tempered and laminated safety glass, decorative options (sandblasted, mirrored, ceramic-printed), and custom shower enclosures & glass partitions for residential and commercial spaces.
glass.shortDescription: Custom glass installations and curtain walls

aluminum.title: Aluminum Works
aluminum.description: Comprehensive aluminum solutions including thermal-break systems for windows & doors, weather-resistant skylights & canopies, ACP (Aluminum Composite Panels) cladding for building exteriors, and custom-tailored profiles for unique architectural requirements.

interior.title: Interior Solutions
interior.description: Custom interior designs and implementations including soundproof glass partitions for offices and hospitals, premium wardrobes & vanities with wood and lacquered glass finishes, and commercial-grade stainless steel kitchen/bathroom units for maximum hygiene and durability.

metal.title: Metal & Iron Works
metal.description: Specializing in 316-grade stainless steel handrails for indoor/outdoor use, custom metal staircases and barriers for commercial/residential applications, and artistic cladding & decorative metalwork for stunning façades and structural elements.

turnkey.title: Turnkey Construction
turnkey.description: Complete solutions including end-to-end building façades design and installation, luxury shopfronts with automatic sliding doors, and custom pergolas & outdoor structures featuring glass/metal shade solutions.

specialty.title: Specialty Services
specialty.description: Advanced solutions including safety-compliant fire-rated glass systems, precision CNC metal/glass cutting for complex designs, and nationwide on-site installation services.

arabCenter.title: Arab Center
arabCenter.scope: Glazed handrails (3,200 lm), wood louvers, shower glass (700 sets)

mallOfQatar.title: Mall of Qatar
mallOfQatar.scope: 4,388 m² aluminum cladding (4mm ACP), galvanized steel tubes

dukhanBank.title: Dukhan Bank HQ
dukhanBank.scope: Mirror glass (6mm) with stainless steel frames, elevator metalwork, shopfronts, toilet cubicles

integratedFamilies.title: Integrated Families Housing
integratedFamilies.scope:
Phase 1: 10mm tempered glass systems, U-channel 316G mirror finish
Phase 2: Mild steel handrails, MS tubes (100x50x2.0mm)

meliaTower.title: Melia Tower
meliaTower.scope: Spider glass façade, stainless steel accessories

ahliBank.title: Ahli Bank
ahliBank.scope: Smart system (120mm double glass), aluminum cladding, stainless steel work

planetMedical.title: Planet Medical Center
planetMedical.scope: Aluminum cladding, curtain walls (150mm double glass), steel handrails

alNagmaa.title: Al Nagmaa Project
alNagmaa.scope: Curtain walls (150mm double glass), spider glass, stainless steel

behzadGroup.title: Behzad Group Building
behzadGroup.scope: 4mm cladding, curtain walls (150mm double glass), interior design

goldenSand.title: Golden Sand
goldenSand.scope: 4mm cladding, curtain walls (150mm double glass), glass partitions

alSmisma.title: Al-Smisma Village
alSmisma.scope: Glass handrails, curtain walls (150mm double glass)

apartmentComplex.title: Apartment Complex
apartmentComplex.scope: Glass partitions, curtain walls (150mm double glass)

millenniumMedical.title: Millennium Medical Center
millenniumMedical.scope: Stainless steel elevation with backlighting, signage

armitageHotel.title: Armitage Hotel
armitageHotel.scope: Curtain walls (150mm double glass), glass partitions

additionalWorks.title: Additional Notable Works
additionalWorks.scope:
Shades & Canopies: Polycarbonate/glass structures for villas/commercial buildings.
Kitchen/Bathroom Equipment: Stainless steel fabrication.
Wardrobes & Vanities: Custom wood/Corian finishes.
Toilet Cubicles: HPL/stainless steel partitions.

about.title: About Al-Amal Engineering
about.subtitle: Building Visions, Delivering Excellence
about.description: Since 2014, Al-Amal Engineering (a subsidiary of Kashkool & Qanass Trading & Contracting) has been a pioneer in architectural innovation across Qatar, and we are now proud to extend our legacy to Syria. Rooted in the same commitment to quality and precision as our parent company, we specialize in:

specialties.glass: Custom Glass & Glazing Solutions: Curtain walls, tempered glass, and fire-rated installations.
specialties.aluminum: Aluminum Fabrication: Windows, doors, cladding, and bespoke metalwork.
specialties.turnkey: Turnkey Building Systems: From design to installation, delivering seamless architectural solutions.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.expertise: Proven Expertise: Over 30+ completed projects in Qatar, including iconic developments like Mall of Qatar and Dukhan Bank HQ.
whyChooseUs.capabilities: End-to-End Capabilities: In-house 800m² workshop with advanced machinery and a 50+ skilled team of engineers and technicians.
whyChooseUs.standards: Global Standards, Local Craftsmanship: Partnerships with industry leaders like Pilkington Glass (USA) and ALUCOBOND (Germany) ensure premium materials, tailored to Syria's unique architectural needs.
whyChooseUs.mission: Mission-Driven: We merge innovation with cost-efficiency to rebuild Syria's infrastructure—safely, sustainably, and on time.

about.tagline: "We Build—But in Our Ways" — a promise of craftsmanship, trust, and relentless attention to detail.
